title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4820.5 - Designation of officer responsible for utilization of bingo monies
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4820.5 - Designation of officer responsible for utilization of bingo monies

State Regulations

The officers of a licensee shall designate an officer to
be in full charge of, and primarily responsible for, the proper utilization of
all monies derived from the conduct of bingo in accordance with the Bingo

Licensing Law and this Chapter. Not less than two members shall be responsible
for counting the bingo proceeds. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4820.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
